document.full_text: the united nations human rights chief called for an independent investigation into the deaths of at least 34 people during an iraqi military raid on a camp housing iranian exiles last week.
document.title: middle east: iraq: inquiry sought in deaths
lines_and_colors: the united nations human rights chief called for an independent investigation into the deaths of at least 34 people during an iraqi military raid on a camp housing iranian exiles last week.
